original_title: Die Geschichte vom Onkel Willy aus Golzow
overview: Subsequent discovery of one of the students from the class, to whom in "Curricula vitae" was not yet dedicated a portrait sketch. What the smallest in the class knew how to make of himself. Why the agricultural machinist and father of two sons from his first marriage is called uncle by his third son.
title: Die Geschichte vom Onkel Willy aus Golzow
